Crimes.Sub_Crime_Type: Threats by intimate partner and employer
Crimes.Victim_Status: Female survivor of domestic violence and sexual assault
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: History of domestic violence and sexual assault, power imbalance in employment
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Member failed to adequately assess credibility of applicant's testimony
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: High risk of continued harm if returned to Mexico City
Crimes.Geographic_Context: Mexico, with internal relocation to Mexico City considered
Crimes.Applicable_Statute: IRPA, sections related to refugee protection and internal flight alternative
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Presumption of state protection under Canadian refugee determination framework
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Standard for rebutting viability of Internal Flight Alternative (IFA)
Crimes.Outcome: Decision quashed, case remanded for redetermination
Crimes.Procedural_Issues: Failure to properly weigh evidence and assess credibility
Crimes.Legal_Procedure: Federal Court judicial review of IRB decision
Crimes.Government_Body_Involved: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB)
Crimes.Decision_Standard: Reasonableness and proper application of burden and standard of proof

Crimes.Victim_Status: Female survivor of sexual and domestic violence
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Abuse of power in employment context, ongoing threats
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Member did not give adequate weight to credible testimony
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: High risk of re-victimization in Mexico City
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Continued pursuit and threat from perpetrator
Crimes.Applicable_Statute: Provisions on IFA and state protection
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Duty to rebut presumption of viable IFA
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Relevant jurisprudence on burden of proof in IFA assessments
Crimes.Procedural_Issues: Insufficient reasoning and failure to engage with evidence
Crimes.Legal_Procedure: Federal Court review of IRB decision
Crimes.Decision_Standard: Proper evaluation of evidence on balance of probabilities

Crimes.Sub_Crime_Type: Ongoing abuse and threats by husband
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Pattern of abuse, lack of familial support in Mexico City
Crimes.Evidence_Sufficiency: Sufficient credible evidence including testimony and documents

Crimes.Geographic_Context: Relocation within Mexico (to Mexico City) at issue
Crimes.Applicable_Statute: Sections governing refugee claims and IFA
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Requirement to demonstrate inadequacy of state protection
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Case law on gender-based persecution and IFA
Crimes.Legal_Procedure: Judicial review under Federal Courts Act
Crimes.Decision_Standard: Correct legal test and factual analysis required
